publications.title: A Simple Differentiation Protocol for Generation of Induced Pluripotent Stem Cell-Derived Basal Forebrain-Like Cholinergic Neurons for Alzheimer’s Disease and Frontotemporal Dementia Disease Modeling

donor.disease_description: Characterised by mutations in amyloid precursor protein (APP) or presenilin (PSEN) genes
